ingredient.name: Alit Hide
ingredient.description: Found by killing Alits

ingredient.name: Ampoule Pod
ingredient.description: Common growing in swamps in the Bitter Coast region; one of two possible outputs of the draggle-tail plant (the other is the Coda Flower)

ingredient.name: Ash Salts
ingredient.description: Found by killing Ash creatures

ingredient.name: Ash Yam
ingredient.description: Most common in farm areas, occasionally found in the wild

ingredient.name: Bittergreen Petals
ingredient.description: Grows on thorny vines in drier regions

ingredient.name: Black Anther
ingredient.description: These flowers are most common in the Ascadian Isles region

ingredient.name: Black Lichen
ingredient.description: Somewhat rare, mostly found in caves

ingredient.name: Bloat
ingredient.description: Grows in Bloat Spores, which are unfortunately not found anywhere in the game. The only examples you can find are in random containers, or sold by vendors.

ingredient.name: Bonemeal
ingredient.description: Found on skeletons (living or dead), and also in urns in most tombs.

ingredient.name: Bread
ingredient.description: Found in most taverns and many houses.

ingredient.name: Bungler's Bane
ingredient.description: This shelf-fungus grows on tree trunks in the Bitter Coast region

ingredient.name: Chokeweed
ingredient.description: Found growing in drier regions

ingredient.name: Coda Flower
ingredient.description: Found growing in swampy pools in the Bitter Coast region on the draggle-tail plant

ingredient.name: Comberry
ingredient.description: Grows in shrubs in the West Gash and Ascadian Isles regions

ingredient.name: Corkbulb Root
ingredient.description: Mostly found in drier regions in the wild.

ingredient.name: Corprus Weepings
ingredient.description: Found by killing Corprus Stalkers

ingredient.name: Crab Meat
ingredient.description: Found by killing Mudcrabs

ingredient.name: Daedra Skin
ingredient.description: Somewhat rare, mostly found at vendors

ingredient.name: Daedra's Heart
ingredient.description: Found by killing most Daedra - Dremora, Ogrim, Clannfears, Daedroth, etc.

ingredient.name: Diamond
ingredient.description: Common in barrels in Dwemer ruins. Also found in a small number of caves

ingredient.name: Dreugh Wax
ingredient.description: Found by killing Dreugh

ingredient.name: Ectoplasm
ingredient.description: Found by killing Ghosts

ingredient.name: Emerald
ingredient.description: Common in barrels in Dwemer ruins

ingredient.name: Fire Petal
ingredient.description: Found growing in the Molag Amur and Red Mountain regions

ingredient.name: Fire Salts
ingredient.description: Found by killing Flame Atronachs

ingredient.name: Frost Salts
ingredient.description: Found by killing Frost Atronachs

ingredient.name: Ghoul Heart
ingredient.description: Supposedly the heart tissue of an Ash Ghoul, but not found on them. Mostly in random ingredient containers and sold at vendors.

ingredient.name: Gold Kanet
ingredient.description: Found growing in bushes in the grassy regions

ingredient.name: Gravedust
ingredient.description: No reliable location. Occasionally for sale at vendors or found in random containers

ingredient.name: Green Lichen
ingredient.description: Mostly grows on rocks in caves

ingredient.name: Guar Hide
ingredient.description: Found by killing Guars

ingredient.name: Hackle-Lo Leaf
ingredient.description: Found as food in most houses; grows wild in the Azura's Coast region.

ingredient.name: Heather
ingredient.description: This common flower grows throughout the greener regions of Vvardenfell.

ingredient.name: Hound Meat
ingredient.description: Found by killing Nix-Hounds

ingredient.name: Hypha Facia
ingredient.description: This shelf-fungus is found growing on tree trunks in the Bitter Coast region

ingredient.name: Kagouti Hide
ingredient.description: Found by killing Kagoutis

ingredient.name: Kresh Fiber
ingredient.description: Kreshweed is found growing near sea water, most common in the Azura's Coast, Bitter Coast and West Gash regions.

ingredient.name: Kwama Cuttle
ingredient.description: Found by killing Kwama (any type).

ingredient.name: Large Kwama Egg
ingredient.description: Found in Egg Mines. Also common as food in houses.

ingredient.name: Luminous Russula
ingredient.description: Found in the Bitter Coast region, also common in caves

ingredient.name: Marshmerrow
ingredient.description: Found growing near water, most common in the Azura's Coast region

ingredient.name: Moon Sugar
ingredient.description: Found in smuggler caves. Most vendors will not deal with you if you are carrying this illegal narcotic substance.

ingredient.name: Muck
ingredient.description: Found on Muck Sponges which grow near water in many regions

ingredient.name: Netch Leather
ingredient.description: Found by killing Netch

ingredient.name: Pearl
ingredient.description: Found in kollops on the sea floor. Also found in barrels in Dwemer ruins.

ingredient.name: Racer Plumes
ingredient.description: Found by killing Cliff Racers

ingredient.name: Rat Meat
ingredient.description: Found by killing Rats

ingredient.name: Raw Ebony
ingredient.description: Found in Ebony Mines. Usually a crime to take it.

ingredient.name: Raw Glass
ingredient.description: Found in Glass Mines. Usually a crime to take it.

ingredient.name: Red Lichen
ingredient.description: Found growing on rocks, mostly in the Ashlands. Also for sale at vendors.

ingredient.name: Resin
ingredient.description: No reliable location. Occasionally for sale at vendors or found in random containers.

ingredient.name: Roobrush
ingredient.description: Found growing in hilly regions

ingredient.name: Ruby
ingredient.description: Often found in barrels in Dwemer ruins

ingredient.name: Saltrice
ingredient.description: Found growing near sea water, most common in the Azura's Coast region. Also a common food item in houses.

ingredient.name: Scales
ingredient.description: Found by killing Slaughterfish

ingredient.name: Scamp Skin
ingredient.description: Found by killing Scamps

ingredient.name: Scathecraw
ingredient.description: Grows in dry, hilly regions

ingredient.name: Scrap Metal
ingredient.description: Found by killing Dwemer constructs. Also common in barrels and on shelves in Dwemer ruins.

ingredient.name: Scrib Jelly
ingredient.description: Found by killing Scribs

ingredient.name: Scrib Jerky
ingredient.description: Found as a food item in houses.

ingredient.name: Scuttle
ingredient.description: Found as a food item in houses.

ingredient.name: Shalk Resin
ingredient.description: Found by killing Shalks

ingredient.name: Sload Soap
ingredient.description: Rare. Mostly found for sale at vendors or in random containers.

ingredient.name: Small Kwama Egg
ingredient.description: Found in Egg Mines. Also common food item in houses.

ingredient.name: Spore Pod
ingredient.description: Found on Slough Ferns growing in the Bitter Coast region

ingredient.name: Stoneflower Petals
ingredient.description: These flowers are common in the West Gash and Ascadian Isles regions.

ingredient.name: Trama Root
ingredient.description: Found growing in dry, hilly regions

ingredient.name: Vampire Dust
ingredient.description: Found by killing Vampires

ingredient.name: Violet Coprinus
ingredient.description: These mushrooms grow throughout the Bitter Coast region, and are also common in caves.

ingredient.name: Void Salts
ingredient.description: Found by killing Storm Atronachs or Winged Twilights

ingredient.name: Wickwheat
ingredient.description: Found growing in the Grazelands region

ingredient.name: Willow Anther
ingredient.description: Most common in the Ascadian Isles region

ingredient.name: Adamantium Ore
ingredient.description: Found in Raw Adamantium Rocks. The best use of Adamantium Ore is making Adamantium Armor rather than creating potions.

ingredient.name: Durzog Meat
ingredient.description: Found by killing Durzogs

ingredient.name: Golden Sedge Flowers
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Horn Lily Bulb
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Lloramor Spines
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Meadow Rye
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Nirthfly Stalks
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Noble Sedge Flowers
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Scrib Cabbage
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Sweetpulp
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Timsa-Come-By flowers
ingredient.description: Found in planters throughout Mournhold

ingredient.name: Bear Pelt
ingredient.description: Found by killing Bears

ingredient.name: Bristleback Leather
ingredient.description: Found by killing Bristlebacks (with or without riders)

ingredient.name: Grahl Eyeball
ingredient.description: Found by killing Grahls

ingredient.name: Gravetar
ingredient.description: Found by killing Draugr

ingredient.name: Heartwood
ingredient.description: Occasionally found by killing Spriggans

ingredient.name: Holly Berries
ingredient.description: Grows all over Solstheim

ingredient.name: Horker Tusk
ingredient.description: Found by killing Horkers

ingredient.name: Raw Stalhrim
ingredient.description: Found in barrows. Ancient Stalhrim Pickaxe required.

ingredient.name: Ripened Belladonna Berries
ingredient.description: Somewhat less common than the unripe variety, but still relatively widespread.

ingredient.name: Snow Bear Pelt
ingredient.description: Found by killing Snow Bears

ingredient.name: Snow Wolf Pelt
ingredient.description: Found by killing Snow Wolves

ingredient.name: Unripened Belladonna Berries
ingredient.description: Grows all over Solstheim.Common at barrow entrances.

ingredient.name: Wolf Pelt
ingredient.description: Found by killing Wolves

ingredient.name: Wolfsbane Petals
ingredient.description: Grows on Hvitkald Peak. One found in Lassnr's shack in the Skaal village.

ingredient.name: Alkanet Flower
ingredient.description: Harvested from Alkanet, a fairly common flower in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Aloe Vera Leaves
ingredient.description: Harvested from Aloe Vera, a plant that grows primarily in the Gold Coast.

ingredient.name: Ambrosia
ingredient.description: Harvested from reddish-purple colored Mana Bloom, a flower that is normally found only in Mankar Camoran's Paradise.

ingredient.name: Apple
ingredient.description: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Arrowroot
ingredient.description: Harvested from Arrowroot Plant, a plant that is found in the Gold Coast and Nibenay Valley.

ingredient.name: Beef
ingredient.description: Food, found in a few houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Bergamot Seeds
ingredient.description: Harvested from Bergamot, a flower, particularly common along the Orange Road and near Bravil.

ingredient.name: Blackberry
ingredient.description: Food, found in many houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Blackberry Bushes found on some farms and in the wild in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Bloodgrass
ingredient.description: Harvested from Blood Grass, a common plant in the planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Boar Meat
ingredient.description: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. Can also be collected from dead Boars, which are randomly found in many outdoors regions.

ingredient.name: Bog Beacon Asco Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Bog Beacon, a plant found in Blackwood.

ingredient.name: Bonemeal
ingredient.description: Collected from Bones Undead, i.e., skeletons and liches, which are commonly found in all undead dungeons. There is also a rare variant listed below.

ingredient.name: Bread Loaf
ingredient.description: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Cairn Bolete Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Cairn Bolete, a mushroom found in many caves.

ingredient.name: Carrot
ingredient.description: Food, commonly found in houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Carrot Plants, which are found growing on many farms.

ingredient.name: Cheese Wedge
ingredient.description: Food, commonly found in houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Cheese Wheel
ingredient.description: Food, less commonly found in houses and dining halls than Cheese Wedges.

ingredient.name: Cinnabar Polypore Red Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from red-colored Cinnabar Polypores, a mushroom that grows sparsely in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Cinnabar Polypore Yellow Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from yellow-colored Cinnabar Polypores, a mushroom that grows sparsely in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Clannfear Claws
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Clannfears, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Clouded Funnel Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Clouded Funnel Cap, a mushroom common in mountainous regions (Jerall and Valus Mountains) and Blackwood.

ingredient.name: Columbine Root Pulp
ingredient.description: Harvested from Columbine, a flower that is common in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Corn
ingredient.description: Food, commonly found in houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Corn Stalks, which are found growing in many farms.

ingredient.name: Crab Meat
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Mud Crabs, a common nuisance creature found along water shores and in many dungeons.

ingredient.name: Daedra Heart
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Dremora and Xivilai, both of which are common enemies in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Daedra Silk
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Spider Daedra, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Daedra Venin
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Spider Daedra, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Daedroth Teeth
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Daedroths, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Dragon's Tongue
ingredient.description: Harvested from Dragon's Tongue Plants, a flower found in a few clusters south of Bravil and more sparsely throughout the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Dreugh Wax
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Land Dreughs, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons at high levels.

ingredient.name: Dryad Saddle Polypore Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Dryad's Saddel[sic] Polypore, a rare mushroom that only grows in a few select locations.

ingredient.name: Ectoplasm
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Ethereal Undead, such as ghosts and wraiths, which are commonly found in all undead dungeons.

ingredient.name: Elf Cup Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Elf Cups, a mushroom found growing sparsely in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Emetic Russula Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Emetic Russula, a mushroom found growing sparsely in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Fennel Seeds
ingredient.description: Harvested from Fennel, a plant found primarily in the northern section of the Gold Coast.

ingredient.name: Fire Salts
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Flame Atronachs, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Flax Seeds
ingredient.description: Harvested from Flax, a common flower found in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Flour
ingredient.description: Commonly found in grain sacks in kitchens and pantries, but not technically classified as food).

ingredient.name: Fly Amanita Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Fly Amanita, a common mushroom in cities and in the Great Forest.

ingredient.name: Foxglove Nectar
ingredient.description: Harvested from Foxglove, a common flower in certain parts of the Nibenay Valley and Nibenay Basin.

ingredient.name: Frost Salts
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Frost Atronachs, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Garlic
ingredient.description: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Garlic Clusters (treated as plants), which are found in some houses' basements (especially in Skingrad).

ingredient.name: Ginkgo Leaf
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected. There are a few guaranteed samples, but otherwise it is randomly found on alchemists and in some containers.

ingredient.name: Ginseng
ingredient.description: Harvested from Ginseng Plants, flowers which growly sparsely in the Gold Coast and Nibenay Valley.

ingredient.name: Glow Dust
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Will-o-the-Wisps, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

ingredient.name: Grapes
ingredient.description: Harvested from Grape Vines, which are abundant in several vineyards outside of Skingrad. Can also be found as food in several houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Green Stain Cup Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Green Stain Cups, a mushroom that is common in several regions, but particularly abundant in Blackwood.

ingredient.name: Green Stain Shelf Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Green Stain Shelf plants, a rare mushroom that is hard to distinguish from the more common Cap variety.

ingredient.name: Ham
ingredient.description: Food, found in several houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Harrada
ingredient.description: Harvested from Harrada Root plants, which are common in the Planes of Oblivion, but also possibly hostile.

ingredient.name: Imp Gall
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Imps, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons at low levels.

ingredient.name: Ironwood Nut
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested, collected, or even bought from alchemists. There are 26 guaranteed samples; otherwise they are found randomly in some containers.

ingredient.name: Lady's Mantle Leaves
ingredient.description: Harvested from Lady's Mantle, a flower found near Gottlesfont Priory and in the Gold Coast.

ingredient.name: Lady's Smock Leaves
ingredient.description: Harvested from Lady's Smock, a flower common in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Lavender Sprig
ingredient.description: Harvested from Lavender, a flower common in the Nibenay Basin.

ingredient.name: Leek
ingredient.description: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Leek Plants, which are found growing in a handful of farms.

ingredient.name: Lettuce
ingredient.description: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Lettuce Plants, which are found growing on several farms.

ingredient.name: Lichor
ingredient.description: Harvested from bluish-purple colored Mana Bloom, a flower that is normally found only in Mankar Camoran's Paradise.

ingredient.name: Mandrake Root
ingredient.description: Harvested from Mandrake, a flower found growing in the Colovian Highlands and also near Bravil.

ingredient.name: Milk Thistle Seeds
ingredient.description: Harvested from Milk Thistle, a flower found throughout mountainous regions (Jerall and Valus Mountains) and in some clusters in the Gold Coast.

ingredient.name: Minotaur Horn
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Minotaurs and Minotaur Lords, two types of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

ingredient.name: Monkshood Root Pulp
ingredient.description: Harvested from Monkshood, a common flower in the Great Forest and Nibenay Basin.

ingredient.name: Morning Glory Root Pulp
ingredient.description: Harvested from Morning Glory, a flowering vine found growing on houses and walls in the West Weald and Heartlands.

ingredient.name: Mort Flesh
ingredient.description: Collected from dead zombies, which are commonly found in all undead dungeons.

ingredient.name: Motherwort Sprig
ingredient.description: Harvested from Motherwort, a flower common in most regions of Cyrodiil.

ingredient.name: Mugwort Seeds
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected. The only way to obtain them is by purchasing them from alchemy vendors, who may randomly have some in stock.

ingredient.name: Mutton
ingredient.description: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. Can also be collected from some (but not all) dead sheep.

ingredient.name: Nightshade
ingredient.description: Harvested from Nightshade Plants, a flower found in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Ogre's Teeth
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Ogres, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

ingredient.name: Onion
ingredient.description: Food, found in many houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Orange
ingredient.description: Food, found in many houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Pear
ingredient.description: Food, found in many houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Peony Seeds
ingredient.description: Harvested from Peonies, flowers common in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Potato
ingredient.description: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Potato Plants, which are found growing on several farms.

ingredient.name: Primrose Leaves
ingredient.description: Harvested from Primroses, which are flowers occasionally found growing outside various houses and inns.

ingredient.name: Pumpkin
ingredient.description: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Pumpkin Vines, which are found growing on some farms.

ingredient.name: Purgeblood Salts
ingredient.description: Mined from Purgeblood Crystal Formations, which are only available as part of the Vile Lair download.

ingredient.name: Radish
ingredient.description: Food, found in many houses and dining halls. Can also be harvested from Radish Plants, which are found growing on several farms.

ingredient.name: Rat Meat
ingredient.description: Collected from dead rats, a ubiquitous nuisance creature.

ingredient.name: Redwort Flower
ingredient.description: Harvested from Domica Redwort, a flower found growing in several clusters in Blackwood and sparsely throughout the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Rice
ingredient.description: Food, generally found in grain sacks in kitchens and pantries.

ingredient.name: Root Pulp
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected. Six guaranteed samples exist; otherwise found randomly in some containers.

ingredient.name: Sacred Lotus Seeds
ingredient.description: Harvested from Sacred Lotus plants, which are flowers that grow in shallow water.

ingredient.name: Scales
ingredient.description: Collected from dead slaughterfish, an animal found in deep water, including pools in dungeons.

ingredient.name: Scamp Skin
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Scamps, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Shepherd's Pie
ingredient.description: Food, found in a few houses and dining halls. Also available from Eyja in Rosethorn Hall.

ingredient.name: S'jirra's Famous Potato Bread
ingredient.description: Only available from S'jirra in Faregyl Inn after you have completed The Potato Snatcher. You receive from one to five loaves (based on level) upon completing the quest. You can also return to S'jirra repeatedly to buy more bread, which can then be used for alchemy.

ingredient.name: Somnalius Frond
ingredient.description: Harvested from Somnalius Plants, which are found growing in the Great Forest.

ingredient.name: Spiddal Stick
ingredient.description: Harvested from Spiddal Stick plants, which are common in the Planes of Oblivion, but also tend to be hostile.

ingredient.name: St. Jahn's Wort Nectar
ingredient.description: Harvested from St. Jahn's Wort, a flower most commonly found in the Great Forest.

ingredient.name: Steel-Blue Entoloma Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Steel-Blue Entoloma, a mushroom that is common in the Great Forest.

ingredient.name: Stinkhorn Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Stinkhorn, a mushroom that is found in Blackwood.

ingredient.name: Strawberry
ingredient.description: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Strawberry Bushes found on some farms and in the wild in the West Weald.

ingredient.name: Summer Bolete Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Summer Bolete, a mushroom found in the Great Forest and Nibenay Valley.

ingredient.name: Sweetcake
ingredient.description: Food, found in a few houses and dining halls. Sweetcakes are less common than Sweetrolls.

ingredient.name: Sweetroll
ingredient.description: Food, found in several houses and dining halls.

ingredient.name: Taproot
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Spriggans, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

ingredient.name: Tiger Lily Nectar
ingredient.description: Harvested from both Tiger Lilies and Lily of the Valleys, two types of flower that are most commonly found in the Great Forest.

ingredient.name: Tinder Polypore Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Tinder Polypore, a mushroom common in the Valus Mountains.

ingredient.name: Tobacco
ingredient.description: Technically treated as a food and can be found in a few houses. It can also be harvested from Tobacco Plants, which are found on several farms.

ingredient.name: Tomato
ingredient.description: Food, widely found in houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Tomato Plants, which are found growing on many farms.

ingredient.name: Troll Fat
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Trolls, a type of monster found outdoors and in monster dungeons.

ingredient.name: Vampire Dust
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Vampires, found in a range of vampire dungeons. There is also a rare variant listed below.

ingredient.name: Venison
ingredient.description: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. It can also be collected from dead deer, which are animals found outdoors throughout Cyrodiil.

ingredient.name: Viper's Bugloss Leaves
ingredient.description: Harvested from Viper's Bugloss, a flower which is abundant in the Great Forest.

ingredient.name: Void Salts
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Storm Atronachs, a type of Daedra common in the Planes of Oblivion.

ingredient.name: Water Hyacinth Nectar
ingredient.description: Harvested from Water Hyacinth, a flower found growing in shallow water.

ingredient.name: Watermelon
ingredient.description: Food, found in several houses and dining halls. It can also be harvested from Watermelon Vines, which grow on a few farms.

ingredient.name: Wheat Grain
ingredient.description: Food, found in grain sacks in kitchens and pantries. It can also be harvested from Wheat Stalks, which grow on a few farms.

ingredient.name: White Seed Pod
ingredient.description: Harvested from Goldenrod, a flower found in the Gold Coast.

ingredient.name: Wisp Stalk Caps
ingredient.description: Harvested from Wisp Stalks, a mushroom that is only found growing underground (i.e., in caves and mines).

ingredient.name: Wormwood Leaves
ingredient.description: Harvested from Wormwood, a plant found growing in the Jerall Mountains.

ingredient.name: Alocasia Fruit
ingredient.description: Harvested from Alocasia plants, found in Mania.

ingredient.name: Ashen Remains
ingredient.description: Created from bones using the Crematorium in Ebrocca.

ingredient.name: Aster Bloom Core
ingredient.description: Harvested from Aster Bloom plants, found in Mania.

ingredient.name: Black Tar
ingredient.description: Harvested from Dementia variety Mushroom Tree Saplings and from Black Tar plants.

ingredient.name: Blister Pod Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Blister Pod plants, which are found in Dementia.

ingredient.name: Bone Marrow
ingredient.description: Found on Shambles (50% chance they may yield Bone Shard instead). Also called "Shambles Marrow."

ingredient.name: Bone Shard
ingredient.description: Found on Shambles (50% chance they may yield Bone Marrow instead).

ingredient.name: Congealed Putrescence
ingredient.description: Harvested from Putrid Gigantea plants, found in Dementia.

ingredient.name: Elytra Ichor
ingredient.description: Found on Elytras.

ingredient.name: Flame Stalk
ingredient.description: Harvested from Flame Stalk plants, found in Mania caves.

ingredient.name: Fungus Stalk
ingredient.description: Harvested from Fungus Stalk plants, found in Dementia.

ingredient.name: Gnarl Bark
ingredient.description: Found on Gnarls.

ingredient.name: Grummite Eggs
ingredient.description: Harvested from Grummite Egg Mounds and Grummite Egg Sacs, found primarily in Dementia. May also be found on Grummites (25% chance).

ingredient.name: Hound Tooth
ingredient.description: Found on Skinned Hounds.

ingredient.name: Hunger Tongue
ingredient.description: Found on Hungers.

ingredient.name: Hydnum Azure Giant Spore
ingredient.description: Harvested from Hydnum Azure plants, found in Mania.

ingredient.name: Letifer Orca Digestive Slime
ingredient.description: Harvested from Letifer Orca Planta, found in Dementia. Also called simply "Digestive Slime."

ingredient.name: Red Kelp Gas Bladder
ingredient.description: Harvested from Red Kelp, found in Mania. Also called simply "Gas Bladder."

ingredient.name: Rot Scale
ingredient.description: Harvested from Rot Scale, found in Dementia caves.

ingredient.name: Scalon Fin
ingredient.description: Found on Scalons.

ingredient.name: Screaming Maw
ingredient.description: Harvested from Screaming Maw plants, found in Mania caves.

ingredient.name: Smoked Baliwog Leg
ingredient.description: Found as food in shops and houses.

ingredient.name: Swamp Tentacle
ingredient.description: Harvested from Swamp Tentacle plants, found in Dementia.

ingredient.name: Thorn Hook
ingredient.description: Harvested from Thorn Hook plants, found in Dementia caves.

ingredient.name: Unrefined Greenmote
ingredient.description: Harvested from Mania variety Mushroom Tree Saplings.

ingredient.name: Void Essence
ingredient.description: Found on Flesh Atronachs.

ingredient.name: Watcher's Eye
ingredient.description: Harvested from Watcher's Eye plants, which grow in Dementia caves.

ingredient.name: Water Root Pod Pit
ingredient.description: Harvested from Water Root Pod plants, which grow in Dementia. Also called simply "Pod Pit."

ingredient.name: Wisp Core
ingredient.description: Harvested from Root Stalks, which grow in Dementia and Mania caves.

ingredient.name: Withering Moon
ingredient.description: Harvested from Withering Moon plants, which grow in Dementia caves.

ingredient.name: Worm's Head Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from Worm's Head plants, which grow in Mania.

ingredient.name: Abecean Longfin
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Abacean Longfin fish.

ingredient.name: Ancestor Moth Wing
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Ancestor Moths.

ingredient.name: Bear Claws
ingredient.description: Collected from various types of dead Bears.

ingredient.name: Bee
ingredient.description: Collected from beehives and by catching Bees.

ingredient.name: Beehive Husk
ingredient.description: Collected from beehives.

ingredient.name: Bleeding Crown
ingredient.description: Harvested from Bleeding Crown, a mushroom found in various caves.

ingredient.name: Blisterwort
ingredient.description: Harvested from Blisterwort mushrooms found in various caves.

ingredient.name: Blue Butterfly Wing
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Blue Butterflies. Often found during daylight hours near flowering plants.

ingredient.name: Blue Dartwing
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Dragonflies found near rivers and streams below the snow line.

ingredient.name: Blue Mountain Flower
ingredient.description: Harvested from the blue variety of Mountain Flower, found throughout Skyrim.

ingredient.name: Bone Meal
ingredient.description: Collected from undead such as skeletons, and Draugr.

ingredient.name: Briar Heart
ingredient.description: Collected from Forsworn Briarhearts.

ingredient.name: Butterfly Wing
ingredient.description: Collected from catching Monarch Butterflies. Often found during daylight hours near flowering plants.

ingredient.name: Canis Root
ingredient.description: Harvested from Canis Root, found in The Rift and Hjaalmarch.

ingredient.name: Charred Skeever Hide
ingredient.description: Food, collected from dead Skeevers found on roasting spits.

ingredient.name: Chaurus Eggs
ingredient.description: Collected from Chaurus Egg Sacs, found in Falmer caves.

ingredient.name: Chaurus Hunter Antennae
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Chaurus Hunters and Chaurus Hunter Fledglings.

ingredient.name: Chicken's Egg
ingredient.description: Food, harvested from Chicken nests in various farms.

ingredient.name: Creep Cluster
ingredient.description: Harvested from Creep Cluster, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

ingredient.name: Crimson Nirnroot
ingredient.description: Harvested from Crimson Nirnroot, found in Blackreach, needed for the quest A Return To Your Roots.

ingredient.name: Cyrodilic Spadetail
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Cyrodilic Spadetail fish.

ingredient.name: Daedra Heart
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Dremora.

ingredient.name: Deathbell
ingredient.description: Harvested from Deathbell, found in Hjaalmarch. Needed for the quests Few and Far Between and The Only Cure.

ingredient.name: Dragon's Tongue
ingredient.description: Harvested from Dragon's Tongue, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

ingredient.name: Dwarven Oil
ingredient.description: Collected from destroyed Dwarven Automatons, found in Dwarven Ruins.

ingredient.name: Ectoplasm
ingredient.description: Collected from undead Ghosts.

ingredient.name: Elves Ear
ingredient.description: Harvested from Dried Elves Ear bunches found in homes and camps.

ingredient.name: Eye of Sabre Cat
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Sabre Cats.

ingredient.name: Falmer Ear
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Falmer.

ingredient.name: Fire Salts
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Flame Atronachs, a type of daedra. Needed for the quest Stoking the Flames.

ingredient.name: Fly Amanita
ingredient.description: Harvested from Fly Amanita mushrooms, found in various caves.

ingredient.name: Frost Mirriam
ingredient.description: Harvested from Dried Frost Mirriam bunches found in homes and camps.

ingredient.name: Frost Salts
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Frost Atronachs, a type of daedra.

ingredient.name: Garlic
ingredient.description: Food. Can also be harvested from Garlic Braids.

ingredient.name: Giant Lichen
ingredient.description: Harvested from Giant Lichen, found in Hjaalmarch.

ingredient.name: Giant's Toe
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Giants, which can be found in Giant Camps.

ingredient.name: Gleamblossom
ingredient.description: Harvested from the plant of the same name.

ingredient.name: Glow Dust
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Wisps and Wispmothers.

ingredient.name: Glowing Mushroom
ingredient.description: Harvested from Glowing Mushrooms, found in various caves.

ingredient.name: Grass Pod
ingredient.description: Harvested from Spiky Grass, found in northern regions of Skyrim.

ingredient.name: Hagraven Claw
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Hagravens.

ingredient.name: Hagraven Feathers
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Hagravens. Can also be found scattered around their sleeping areas.

ingredient.name: Hanging Moss
ingredient.description: Harvested from Hanging Moss.

ingredient.name: Hawk Beak
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Hawks.

ingredient.name: Hawk Feathers
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Hawks.

ingredient.name: Hawk's Egg
ingredient.description: Harvested from Hawk nests.

ingredient.name: Histcarp
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Histcarp fish.

ingredient.name: Honeycomb
ingredient.description: Food. Collected from beehives.

ingredient.name: Human Flesh
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected; with the Dawnguard add-on installed, several respawning samples can be found in Volkihar Keep.

ingredient.name: Human Heart
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected; limited number of samples available.

ingredient.name: Ice Wraith Teeth
ingredient.description: Collected from Ice Wraiths. Needed for the quest Ice Cold.

ingredient.name: Imp Stool
ingredient.description: Harvested from Imp Stool mushrooms, found in various caves.

ingredient.name: Jazbay Grapes
ingredient.description: Harvested from Jazbay vines, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch. Needed for the quest Smooth Jazbay.

ingredient.name: Juniper Berries
ingredient.description: Harvested from Juniper shrubs, common in The Reach. Needed for the quest Elmus Favor Quest.

ingredient.name: Large Antlers
ingredient.description: Collected from dead male Elk.

ingredient.name: Lavender
ingredient.description: Harvested from Lavender, most common in Whiterun Hold.

ingredient.name: Luna Moth Wing
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Luna Moths. Often found near flowers after dark.

ingredient.name: Moon Sugar
ingredient.description: Cannot be collected or harvested. Can be purchased from the Khajiit Traders.

ingredient.name: Mora Tapinella
ingredient.description: Harvested from Mora Tapinella mushrooms, found growing on dead trees.

ingredient.name: Mudcrab Chitin
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Mudcrabs, found in or near bodies of water.

ingredient.name: Namira's Rot
ingredient.description: Harvested from Namira's Rot mushrooms, found in various caves.

ingredient.name: Nightshade
ingredient.description: Harvested from Nightshade, found growing throughout Skyrim. Needed for the quest Few and Far Between.

ingredient.name: Nirnroot
ingredient.description: Harvested from Nirnroot, found near bodies of water throughout Skyrim. Needed for the quest Few and Far Between.

ingredient.name: Nordic Barnacle
ingredient.description: Harvested from Nordic Barnacle Clusters, found in or near water.

ingredient.name: Orange Dartwing
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Dragonflies found near rivers and streams below the snow line.

ingredient.name: Pearl
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected in the original version of the game; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked. With Dragonborn, they can be harvested from Pearl Oysters in Solstheim.

ingredient.name: Pine Thrush Egg
ingredient.description: Harvested from bird nests in forested regions, in particular The Rift.

ingredient.name: Poison Bloom
ingredient.description: Harvested from the plant of the same name.

ingredient.name: Powdered Mammoth Tusk
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked.

ingredient.name: Purple Mountain Flower
ingredient.description: Harvested from the purple variety of Mountain Flower.

ingredient.name: Red Mountain Flower
ingredient.description: Harvested from the red variety of Mountain Flower.

ingredient.name: River Betty
ingredient.description: Collected by catching River Betty fish.

ingredient.name: Rock Warbler Egg
ingredient.description: Harvested from bird nests in rocky regions, in particular The Reach.

ingredient.name: Sabre Cat Tooth
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Sabre cats.

ingredient.name: Salmon Roe
ingredient.description: Harvested from jumping Salmon.

ingredient.name: Salt Pile
ingredient.description: Food. Cannot be harvested or collected, but is commonly found in barrels and sacks.

ingredient.name: Scaly Pholiota
ingredient.description: Harvested from Scaly Pholiota mushrooms, found growing on dead trees.

ingredient.name: Silverside Perch
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Silverside Perch fish.

ingredient.name: Skeever Tail
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Skeevers.

ingredient.name: Slaughterfish Egg
ingredient.description: Collected from Slaughterfish Egg Nests, found in or near water.

ingredient.name: Slaughterfish Scales
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Slaughterfish.

ingredient.name: Small Antlers
ingredient.description: Collected from dead female Elk.

ingredient.name: Small Pearl
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected in the original version of the game; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked. With Dragonborn, they can be harvested from Pearl Oysters in Solstheim.

ingredient.name: Snowberries
ingredient.description: Harvested from Snowberry bushes, found in snowy regions of Skyrim.

ingredient.name: Spider Egg
ingredient.description: Collected from spider Egg Sacs and Web Sacs.

ingredient.name: Spriggan Sap
ingredient.description: Cannot be harvested or collected; best source is merchants.

ingredient.name: Swamp Fungal Pod
ingredient.description: Harvested from Swamp Fungal Pod, common in the tundra marsh of Hjaalmarch.

ingredient.name: Taproot
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Spriggans.

ingredient.name: Thistle Branch
ingredient.description: Harvested from Thistle.

ingredient.name: Torchbug Thorax
ingredient.description: Collected by catching Torchbugs. Found below the snowline after dark.

ingredient.name: Troll Fat
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Trolls. Needed for the quest The Cursed Tribe.

ingredient.name: Tundra Cotton
ingredient.description: Harvested from Tundra Cotton, found in Whiterun Hold.

ingredient.name: Vampire Dust
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Vampires.

ingredient.name: Void Salts
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Storm Atronachs.

ingredient.name: Wheat
ingredient.description: Food. Harvested from wheat bushels, found in various farms.

ingredient.name: White Cap
ingredient.description: Harvested from White Cap mushrooms, found in various caves.

ingredient.name: Wisp Wrappings
ingredient.description: Collected from dead Wispmothers.

ingredient.name: Yellow Mountain Flower
ingredient.description: Harvested from the yellow variety of Mountain Flower.
